body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Sweet Treats Bakery! My name is Billy Hall. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Billy, my name is Katherine Clark. I have an issue with a return.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Katherine. Could you please provide me with the order number for the return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the order number is two four seven eight one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also let me know the reason for the return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I received the wrong cake. I ordered a chocolate cake, but I received a vanilla one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see, that must have been quite surprising. I apologize for the error. Can I have the best contact number to reach you for further updates?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Katherine. I'll process your return and ensure the correct cake is sent out to you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Billy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Katherine. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
